title: ezhuga ezhuga
sahitya:
ezhuga ezhuga ezhuga nyAyirE dishai engum pongum tangak-kanal pOl


anupallavi

  pazhudilAda munivar uLLam pazhutta jnAnak-kozhundaip-pOla


caraNam    iruLait-turattum ravi vAzhgavE en idaya veLiyil udayamAgi 
aruLaip-pozhiyum azhagu vAzhgavE paramAnandattin amudak-kuDam pOl
